item.title: About
item.description: Presentation (professional) Working as an Senior Consultant at IP-Solutions AB. I am is very social and analytical. I combine my deep knowledge and interest in the technology field with an excellent ability to work as an architect and troubleshooting system. I am result oriented and driven by ambition to deliver high quality in my assignments. My specialist expertic is mainly in VoIP/SIP, but I have also been working with general design, troubleshooting and virtualization.
